Text:
Why exactly is this such a difficult torrent to find and comes out so long after the show actually aired? Just curious if there's something about this show in particular. It's the same way with The Burn.

Thanks for the up.
Also, yeah, it is definitely watchable. It's like a V:6 but it's Tosh, you aren't watching for big explosions and visual effects.

I have no idea... the only place i can find it is a very choppy online stream, so i capture it from that and then share it here and a couple other places... definitely one of the funniest shows on television now, and i have no idea why it isn't capped by scene
